perturbation.original_text: For the Initial Term of this Agreement, iVillage agrees that Ford shall be the exclusive automobile manufacturer sponsor and advertiser throughout the Network, with respect to entities whose primary business is that of an automotive manufacturer and/or retailer. For purposes of this Agreement, the term "retailer" shall refer to an entity which sells new and/or used vehicles.
perturbation.changed_text: For the Initial Term of this Agreement, iVillage agrees that Ford shall be the exclusive automobile manufacturer sponsor and advertiser throughout the Network. For purposes of this Agreement, the term "retailer" shall refer to an entity which sells new and/or used vehicles.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase "with respect to entities whose primary business is that of an automotive manufacturer and/or retailer" has been removed. The contract now states Ford is the exclusive advertiser without clarifying the scope of exclusivity. This creates uncertainty because it is unclear whether Ford's exclusivity extends to entities that are not primarily automotive manufacturers/retailers, leading to potential disputes regarding what constitutes a conflicting sponsorship.

perturbation.original_text: During the Promotion Period, iVillage traffic shall be audited by a third party traffic auditor listed on Exhibit A and iVillage shall provide FMM with relevant reports on a biweekly basis. iVillage will provide ongoing marketing, creative, technical and editorial consultation to FMM.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Promotion Period, iVillage traffic shall be audited by a third party traffic auditor and iVillage shall provide FMM with relevant reports on a biweekly basis. iVillage will provide ongoing marketing, creative, technical and editorial consultation to FMM.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase 'listed on Exhibit A' and not providing a list of the third party traffic auditors, it creates a contradiction when section 3 mentions the auditors are selected by the 2.C.(ii). This creates a contradiction as it states the third party traffic auditor will be audited, but this will not be possible. Enforcement becomes difficult because the specified auditors are undefined.

perturbation.original_text: In the event that iVillage fails to deliver the advertising impressions during the Promotion Period, FMM shall have the option of either (a) extending the Initial Term of this Agreement for an additional three (3) month period to "make good" the undelivered impressions or (b) requiring iVillage to refund to FMM an amount equal to [*] for each [*] impressions which were not delivered.
perturbation.changed_text: In the event that iVillage fails to deliver the advertising impressions during the Promotion Period, FMM shall have the option of either (a) extending the Initial Term of this Agreement for an additional three (3) month period to "make good" the undelivered impressions or (b) requiring iVillage to refund to FMM an amount equal to refund amount for each impressions which were not delivered.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the details [*] for each [*] impressions which were not delivered, the formula to calculate the refund is undefined. This creates a contradiction as section 5 mentions payments from FMC, but the refund formula is not included. Enforcement will become difficult because the amount to pay back has been ommited.
